idea:
‘Everi’ a online market place for used 2 Wheelers operated by Wasan Business Innovations Private Limited, a Nashik based startup company.

Everi provides end-to end assistance to customers starting from selecting a bike to assisted purchase to post sale services. The startup offers One stop solution with test rides, online bike reservation, and facilitates finance, Ownership Transfer and Insurance too.

To ensure quality, the vehicles ares listed on its platform everi.in and We verify sellers, examine vehicle’s accidental cases, refurbish and rebranding wherever require and checked by Everi’s team of auto experts and then assigned a rating.

Our qualified technical staff check all vehicles and have to pass through stringent quality check before getting listed on our portal for sale. Further Technical and Quality control team to ensure quality and present good working condition of the vehicle, aside assess life expectancy. Company Do not sale any non standard vehicles and customer get Trust on us due to our Quality commitment and after sale servicing facility.

The used two wheeler market is pretty unorganised in India and people face problems buying used ones. Therefore we thought to sell certified used 2 wheelers with warranty which makes easier, convenient and more trustworthy process when it came to buying used two-wheelers, and make it hassle-free. Therefore Opportunity is huge and scalable business india.
name: WASAN BUSINESS INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
